description: The Wolf Eyes Chinese Dogwood (Cornus kousa 'Wolf Eyes') is amazing due to its unique features. With its double-white blooms and distinctive foliage, this two-tone dogwood is sure to impress. Not to mention its eye-catching name and the Wolf Eyes, bright yellow eyespots all over its deeply veined foliage, which contrasts mesmerizingly against its cherry-red stems. Moreover, its remarkable flowering and fruiting characteristics, and its tolerance to a wide range of soil types, make it an excellent and attractive choice for a garden centerpiece or as a hedge or screen.
